org.opencypher.gremlin.client

Interface CypherGremlinClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface CypherGremlinClient
extends Closeable
    This is a convenience wrapper around a Gremlin Client that configures the provided Client to be able to send Cypher queries to a Gremlin Server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CypherGremlinClient bytecode(Client client)
      Creates a CypherGremlinClient that can send Cypher queries to any Gremlin Server or a compatible graph database as Gremlin bytecode.

      • translating

        static CypherGremlinClient translating(Client client)
        Creates a CypherGremlinClient that can send Cypher queries to any Gremlin Server or a compatible graph database as Gremlin-Groovy.

        Cypher to Gremlin translation is done on the client's thread, before sending the query to Gremlin Server.

        Parameters:
        client - Gremlin client
        Returns:
        Cypher-enabled client

      • inMemory

        static CypherGremlinClient inMemory(GraphTraversalSource gts)
        Creates a CypherGremlinClient that executes Cypher queries directly on the configured GraphTraversalSource.

        Cypher to Gremlin translation is done on the client's thread. Graph traversal execution is not synchronized.

        Parameters:
        gts - source of GraphTraversal to translate to
        Returns:
        Cypher-enabled client

      • retrieving

        static CypherGremlinClient retrieving(Client client,
                                      org.opencypher.gremlin.translation.translator.TranslatorFlavor flavor)
        Creates a CypherGremlinClient that can send Cypher queries to any Gremlin Server or a compatible graph database as Gremlin-Groovy.

        Cypher to Gremlin translation is done on the client's thread, before sending the query to Gremlin Server.

        Difference with translating(Client, TranslatorFlavor) is that on request client retrieves and stores the entire result stream. See ResultSet.all().

        This is not optimal for large result sets as the results will be held in memory at once. Use only for compatibility reasons.

        Parameters:
        client - Gremlin client
        flavor - translation flavor
        Returns:
        Cypher-enabled client
        See Also:
        translating(Client, TranslatorFlavor)
